FO - Fine
Fined £6787.00
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Years Concurrent Consecutive to offence Consecutive to offence. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for people and their property, because the number and nature of the offences shows that the defendant is operating as a professional criminal, because the offence was aggravated by being committed whilst on bail, because the offence was committed during the operational period of a suspended sentence, other reasons. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 56. Number of days in custody in foreign jurisdiction to count: 45. Total custodial period is life. Consecutive to sentence imposed on 08/08/2026, which was imposed by Aberdeen Sheriff Court District. Minimum term: 3 Years. Defendant sentenced without a pre-sentence report because Reason for sentence without PSR
 test. Sentenced in absence.
